flavorText: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.
name: Galecaster Colossus

rulings.text: To activate Galecaster Colossus’s ability, you may tap any untapped Wizard you control, including one you haven’t controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn, such as itself. (Note that tapping the creature doesn’t use {T} [the tap symbol].)

text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
